original_text: Nevertheless the dimness shall not be such as was in her vexation, when at the first he lightly afflicted the land of Zebulun and the land of Naphtali, and afterward did more grievously afflict her by the way of the sea, beyond Jordan, in Galilee of the nations.
korean_text: 전에 고통 받던 자들에게는 흑암이 없으리로다 옛적에는 여호와께서 스불론 땅과 납달리 땅이 멸시를 당하게 하셨더니 후에는 해변 길과 요단 저쪽 이방의 갈릴리를 영화롭게 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: Nevertheless the dimness shall not be such
sentences.korean_translation: 그럼에도 불구하고 그 흑암은 그러하지 않을 것이라

sentences.original_text: when at the first he lightly afflicted
the land of Zebulun and the land of Naphtali
and afterward did more grievously afflict her
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나중에 그녀를 더욱 무겁게 괴롭혔다

sentences.original_text: by the way of the sea
